description.message: Checks if your cache-control header and asset strategy follows best practices

directiveInvalid.description: Report message when the directives are invalid

directiveInvalidValue.description: Report message when the directives have invalid value

directiveNotRecomended.description: Report message when a directive is not recomended

noCacheBustingPattern.description: Report message when a cache busting pattern is not configured
noCacheBustingPattern.message: No configured patterns for cache busting match $1. See docs to add a custom one.

noHeaderFound.description: Report message when the header "cache-control" doesn't exists or is empty
noHeaderFound.message: No "cache-control" header or empty value found. It should have a value

staticNotImmutable.description: Report message when an static resource is not using the directive 'immutable'
staticNotImmutable.message:
Static resources should use the "immutable" directive:
Directives used: $1

staticResourceCacheValue.description: Report message when a static resource has an short cache value
staticResourceCacheValue.message:
Static resources should have a long cache value ($1):
Directives used: $2

targetShouldNotBeCached.description: Report message when the target shouldn't be cached
targetShouldNotBeCached.message:
The target should not be cached, or have a small "max-age" value ($1):
$2

wrongCombination.description: Report message when the Cache-Control header is using a wrong combination of directives
wrongCombination.message:
The following Cache-Control header is using a wrong combination of directives:
$1
